title: Police Make Arrests in Lanham Murder
body:
Anyone with information about
this case is asked to call the Prince George’s County Police Department’s
Homicide Unit at (301) 772-4925.  Callers wishing to remain anonymous may
call Crime Solvers at 1-866-411 TIPS (8477), text “PGPD plus your message” to
CRIMES (274637) on your cell phone, or go to  to submit a
tip online.
Posted by


Prince George's County Police


at
